{"id":831160155,"question_id":4,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 7 months","timestamp":1666843683,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"5 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/831160155/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Median of Two Sorted Arrays","memory":"50.2 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public double findMedianSortedArrays(int[] nums1, int[] nums2) {\n        \n        \n        int[] arr = merge(nums1, nums2);\n        \n        int l1 = nums1.length;\n        int l2 = nums2.length;\n        \n        if((l1+l2)%2==1)\n            return Double.valueOf(arr[(l1+l2)/2]);\n        \n        return Double.valueOf((arr[(l1+l2)/2] +arr[(l1+l2)/2-1]))/2;\n        \n        \n    }\n    \n    private int[] merge(int[] nums1, int[] nums2){\n        \n        int l1 = nums1.length;\n        int l2 = nums2.length;\n        int[] res = new int[l1+l2];\n        \n        int i1=0, i2=0, i=0;\n        \n        while(i1<l1 && i2<l2){\n            \n            if(nums1[i1]<=nums2[i2]){\n                res[i] = nums1[i1];\n                i1++;\n            }else{\n                res[i] = nums2[i2];\n                i2++;\n            }\n            i++;\n        }\n        \n        while(i1<l1){\n            res[i] = nums1[i1];\n            i1++;\n            i++;\n        }\n        \n        while(i2<l2){\n            res[i] = nums2[i2];\n            i2++;\n            i++;\n        }\n        \n        return res;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"median-of-two-sorted-arrays","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
